synopsis.text:
He ading our way from Korea is a delightful and humorous anime that doesn't need a single word of dialogue to captivate its audience! Meet Pucca, a charming and spirited 10-year-old girl who works as a delivery girl for her parents' Chinese restaurant. When she's not busy serving up delicious ja jang myung (Korean black noodles), Pucca has one burning obsession: to capture the heart and steal a kiss from her crush, Garu, an aspiring ninja.

Garu, accompanied by his feline companion Mio, is a shy and reserved young man who is constantly trying to evade Pucca's relentless pursuit. Despite his best efforts, her determination never wavers, leading to a series of comical and heartwarming escapades. The only thing they seem to agree on is their shared love for chocolate.

Prepare for a rollercoaster of laughter and endearing moments as Pucca and Garu navigate through the ups and downs of young love in this delightful Korean ONA. Will Pucca finally succeed in her quest for a kiss, or will Garu continue to elude her affections? Join them in their adventures to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
